name: TBP
description:
Controls: Movement Arrow Keys,  Jump Z,  Attack X,  Bounce Down, Restart R, Pause Enter

PS4 Controller: Movement D Pad / Stick, Jump X, Attack Square, Bounce Down, Restart R1, Pause Options

Platformer I made in my spare time. Its very short but their are a lot of skill checks / short cuts that let you beat the game faster if you got enough skill for it.
